title: Pleasure domes
creator_contributor_role: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, production company
abstract: Is Cannes really like St. Kilda, or is it just a state of mind?
description: Is Cannes really like St. Kilda, or is it just a state of mind? Animated watercolour drawings and hand coloured photocopies shape this introspective reflection on the nature of landscape and human responses to it. It hints that our perception of landscape is never direct but always filtered through a set of constructs, either physical or psychological.
